sakila.payment.pk_check: select payment_id, count(*) from sakila.payment group by payment_id having count(*) > 1

mandatory_columns_check.customer_id: select count(*) from sakila.payment where customer_id is null
mandatory_columns_check.staff_id: select count(*) from sakila.payment where staff_id is null
mandatory_columns_check.rental_id: select count(*) from sakila.payment where rental_id is null

fk_check.customer_id: select count(*) from sakila.payment where customer_id not in (select customer_id from sakila.customer)
fk_check.staff_id: select count(*) from sakila.payment where staff_id not in (select staff_id from sakila.staff)
fk_check.rental_id: select count(*) from sakila.payment where rental_id not in (select rental_id from sakila.rental)
